name: Le Jasmin
description: Located in Montagnac, 17 km from Gréoux-les-Bains, Le Jasmin is an air-conditioned Bed & Breakfast featuring free WiFi access and free private parking. The rooms have a flat-screen TV.

name: " Le CHABASSOLE " Maison d'hôtes et de bien-être dans le Verdon - AIGUINES
description: Offering an outdoor pool, Le Chabassole B&B is located in the heart of the Regional Park of Verdon just 300 metres from the shore of Sainte Croix Lake, 4 km from Les Salles-sur-Verdon and 6 km from...

name: Hotel Le Panoramic
description: Set in a 4-hectare estate in the heart of Verdon Regional Natural Park, Hotel Le Panoramic offers guestrooms 700 metres from Palud sur Verdon.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Lyon
description: Located 300 metres from Part-Dieu Train Station, the hotel features an on-site bar & restaurant with panoramic views of Lyon from the 32nd floor of the iconic Part Dieu Tower.

name: Campanile Lyon Centre Part-Dieu
description: Located opposite Lyon’s Part-Dieu Train Station, Campanile Lyon Centre Part-Dieu offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. A buffet restaurant and bar are available for meals and drinks.

name: MOB HOTEL Lyon Confluence
description: Situated 2 minutes' walk from the Musée des Confluences and 10 minutes' walk from a shopping centre, MOB HOTEL Lyon Confluence features a restaurant and free WiFi throughout the property.

name: Campanile Lyon Centre - Berges du Rhône
description: Campanile Lyon Centre - Berges du Rhône offers free WiFi access. It is just a 2-minute walk from the Guillotière Metro Station and an 8-minute drive from the Part-Dieu Train Station.

name: Mercure Lyon Centre Beaux-Arts
description: Located in central Lyon, in a 19th century building, this Mercure hotel is a 8-minute walk from Lyon old town and a 5-minute walk from Bellecour Square.

name: Odalys City Lyon Bioparc
description: Located in a residential area in Lyon, Odalys City Lyon Bioparc offers non-smoking air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi.

name: Novotel Lyon Confluence
description: Featuring a terrace and a bar with panoramic river views, Novotel Lyon Confluence is set in the centre of Lyon on the banks of the Saône River. A Vaporetto Station is located just outside the hotel.

name: Residhotel Lyon Part Dieu
description: Residhotel Lyon Part Dieu is in heart of the business district in Lyon, just 700 metres from La Part-Dieu Train Station and the airport shuttle stop. It offers apartments with free WiFi access.

name: Campanile Lyon Centre - Gare Perrache - Confluence
description: Campanile Lyon Centre - Gare Perrache - Confluence is located in Lyon, within 50 metres of Lyon-Perrache Railway and Metro Stations. Free WiFi is available throughout.

name: Best Western Crequi Lyon Part Dieu
description: Best Western Crequi Lyon Part Dieu is located in central Lyon, just 1 km from Lyon Part-Dieu TGV Train Station. It offers a 24-hour reception and bar, an interior garden and free WiFi access.

name: Residence Montempo Lyon Cite Internationale
description: Residence Montempo Lyon Cite Internationale offers ApartHotel accommodation next to the Parc de la Tête d'Or, in the heart of the Congress Centre area and a 15-minute drive from the centre of Lyon.

name: Résidence Montempô Part Dieu
description: Located in Lyon, Résidence Hôtelière Temporim Part Dieu offers fully equipped studios and apartments. It is 400 metres from Lyon Part Dieu Train Station and guests have access to free WiFi.

name: Sofitel Lyon Bellecour
description: Located in the heart of Lyon, a 4-minute walk from Place Bellecour, Sofitel Lyon Bellecour offers 5-star accommodation with a wellness area and a fitness centre.

name: Hotel Carlton Lyon - MGallery Hotel Collection
description: Set in a building dating from 1894, Hotel Carlton Lyon - MGallery by Sofitel is located on Lyon’s Presqu’île, a 5-minute walk from Cordeliers Metro Station.

name: Hotel Victoria Lyon Perrache Confluence
description: Hôtel Victoria Lyon Perrache Confluence is located in the Presqu'île, in the heart of Lyon, just 300 metres from the Parrache TGV and Metro Station.

name: Hôtel Charlemagne
description: Hôtel Charlemagne is located in central Lyon, a 5-minute walk from the Lyon Perrache TGV and Metro stations. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi internet access.

name: Citadines Presqu'île Lyon
description: Citadines Presqu'île Lyon is located in the centre of Lyon, between the Rhône and Saône Rivers in the heart of the Presqu'île district.

name: Odalys City Lyon Confluence
description: Offering an indoor heated swimming pool and a fitness centre, Odalys City Lyon Confluence offers non-smoking self-catering accommodation with free WiFi in the Confluence District of Lyon.

name: Citadines Part-Dieu Lyon
description: Citadines Part-Dieu Lyon is a residence located 150 metres from the Part-Dieu shopping centre.

name: Mercure Lyon Centre Plaza République
description: Located on Lyon Presqu’île, a 10-minute walk from Vieux Lyon, Mercure Lyon Centre Plaza République offers free WiFi throughout the property.

name: Villa Florentine
description: Villa Florentine is located in the heart of Old Lyon with panoramic views of the city. This former convent offers elegant guest rooms, a 24-hour reception and free WiFi throughout.

name: Lagrange Aparthotel Lyon Lumière
description: Featuring a spa with a sauna, hammam and hot tub, Lagrange Aparthotel Lyon Lumière is located halfway between Sans Souci and Monplaisir-Lumière metro stations, both of which offer direct links to...

name: Novotel Lyon Gerland Musée des Confluences
description: Novotel Lyon Gerland Musée des Confluences is located in Lyon, on the banks of Rhône River, 50 metres from the Halle Tony Garnier concert venue, a 5-minute walk from the Musée des Confluences and a...

name: Staycity Aparthotels Rue Garibaldi
description: Opened in March 2017, Staycity Aparthotels Rue Garibaldi offers accommodation in Lyon, a 5-minute walk from Garibaldi-Berthelot tram stop.

name: Hôtel Le Roosevelt
description: Hôtel Le Roosevelt offers accommodation with a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi in Lyon. The nearest metro station is located a 5-minute walk away.
